name: Inside Choreocracy
description:
Inside Choreocracy is a behind-the-scenes text adventure that chronicles how the dance production Choreocracy by  Casson & Friends was made.

Inside Choreocracy was written by Ian Abbott and it takes the real-life interviews, histories and contributions from the cast of dancers and creative team of Choreocracy which were collected during the rehearsals and performances across the UK in 2018.

It was first published in a choose-your-own-adventure style zine in November 2018 and was commissioned by Casson & Friends. 

Now translated for Chapbook (a story format for Twine 2) and released in June 2020.
